{"id":885772758,"question_id":15,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1674751707,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/885772758/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>> ans;\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size() - 2; i++){\n            if(i > 0 && nums[i - 1] == nums[i]) continue;\n            int l = i + 1, r = nums.size() - 1;\n            while(1){\n                while(l > i + 1 && nums[l - 1] == nums[l]) l++;\n                while(r < nums.size() - 1 && nums[r + 1] == nums[r]) r--;\n                if(l >= r) break;\n                if(nums[i] + nums[l] + nums[r] < 0) l++;\n                else if(nums[i] + nums[l] + nums[r] > 0) r--;\n                else{\n                    ans.push_back({nums[i], nums[l], nums[r]});\n                    l++, r--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
